meanings.sent1: She was exampling how to solve the math problem to her friend.
meanings.sent2: The teacher was exampling the correct way to conduct a science experiment.
meanings.sent3: The students were exampling different ways to tie their shoelaces for fun.
meanings.sent4: His success story was exampling the power of hard work and determination.
meanings.sent5: The vivid image of the rainbow exampling the beauty of nature stayed in her mind.

meanings.definition: An instance serving as a model.
meanings.sent1: The painting was a great exampling of the artist's talent.
meanings.sent2: The new car model was an exampling of modern engineering.
meanings.sent3: The old clock was an exampling of how time flies.
meanings.sent4: Her kindness was an exampling of how to treat others with respect.
meanings.sent5: The exampling of teamwork in the sports match was truly inspiring.
